name: Self Adhesive Lashes
about: What it is: A revolutionary collection of lashes that require no glue and add instant length and volume— these self-stick lashes can be applied in seconds...Formulation Type: Volumizing..Benefits: Long-wearing, Waterproof..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Care and re-wear: Store lashes on their original lash holders to preserve stickiness and shape. After two to three wears, wipe band with an oil-free makeup remover or water to clean. Warm with a hair dryer for five seconds and apply again. To extend the life of the lashes beyond three to five wears, pair with lash glue.
ingredients: Lash Hairs:.Synthetic Fibers..Lash Band:.Polycyclopentadiene, Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polyisobutene, Mineral Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hydrated Silica, Octadecyl Di-T-Butyl-4-Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, [+/- D&C Black No. 2].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Curl your natural lashes and apply a light coat of mascara if desired..-Remove lash holders from tray and peel off lashes. Measure and trim to fit eyes. Place lash holders back on tray for future lash storage..-Apply lashes along the lash line pressing on the band to secure it to the skin. Your body heat will help the lash band stick and stay on all day..-For extra security, apply lashes with an applicator and press them together with your natural lashes along the band. Black band mimics the look of eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lash band is incredibly thick and veryyyyy sticky, but unfortunately because it sticks to everything, it’s hard to properly manipulate into the right spot. Im guessing this is targeted towards beginners but you’re better off with regular lashes and glue. The thickness of the band is a little ridiculous as well, but if you are doing a heavier look with liner, you might be able to get it to blend in.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Money Maker - this bold semi-dramatic, flared lash style adds depth and gradual volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible, don’t stick, not heat activated you need glue. I bought so that I wouldn’t have to use glue and it doesn’t work without glue so definitely don’t buy unless you wanna use glue

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Money Maker - this bold semi-dramatic, flared lash style adds depth and gradual volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are so pretty one and fairly easy to use but it did take a bit to figure out to apply but after that it was easy! I definitely recommend these for anyone who has a hard time with traditional lashes!

reviews.review_title: Waste of money would not stick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these lashes for a special occasion and was so excited to use them. However they did not work. I tried for over an hour to get these to stick and they would not stick at all. So disappointed, a complete waste of money

reviews.review_title: CUTEST STYLE : disclaimer I used glue anyways
reviews.review_text: This style was soooooo cute!! I ended up putting glue anyways because I got my makeup professionally done. It was for a wedding i was in and i didnt want it to come off. But i loved my makeup with the lashes sooo much   Dis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great looking product and love the packaging. They look natural but gives a little boost.  They were easy to apply and remove plus they didn’t irritate my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The adhesive only lasted one wear . Great idea but they  need to improve the viability of the adhesive.

reviews.review_title: Not sticky, very easy to fall off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well made but not very sticky after 1 day use. I like the idea but it’s just not a good product! Also the black line is so thick and it doesn’t look natural on my eye at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got these for free for testing purposes, but I would not buy them. They look like they'd be nice and they're good quality, but they don't stay on well at all with the adhesive provided. If you use regular eyelash glue (which defeats the purpose) they would look really good like this brands other falsies, but these are a fail for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to apply, they stayed on well, and removal was also easy. I have sensitive skin and this didn't affect me at all. All in all I would get these lashes again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the ease of these lashes; very easy to put on, held strong all day and like other Lilly lashes I’ve used, looked beautiful. However, with strip lashes, I use formaldehyde free glue; these triggered an allergic reaction for me (red, itchy and slightly swollen skin around my eyes). I tried a second time days after my eyes healed and same reaction. If you have a sensitivity with adhesives, use with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes seem easy to use, but they are too dramatic for everyday wear. The black adhesive band also looks like very intense black eyeliner with none of the tapered nuance you can do with eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These worked so beautifully. Lasted all night long and looked fantastic. They definitely stick firm but I didn’t notice any irritation from the adhesive.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Money Maker - this bold semi-dramatic, flared lash style adds depth and gradual volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ￼ this eyelash is so good. This is clueless eyelashes that works on your body heat and I wear this every day all day until I finish my day. ￼

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Money Maker - this bold semi-dramatic, flared lash style adds depth and gradual volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these false lashes! It was super easy to apply and lasted all day and I work 11 hour days nannying kids and being outside with hot weather! Never had a problem, didn't need to fix them or reapply! I'm also very sensitive around the eye area and didn't experience any irritation! Definitely would buy and recommend to everyone that loves false lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These were beautiful and easy to apply. They lasted all night the first time I used them.  However, the second time I applied these lashes, they did not stick as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! They work really well for me and even once the adhesive starts to wear off, they only need a couple little dabs of glue to keep holding. They last through out the day really well and don't leave your lashes clogged up with glue like the glue on ones do. Love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Go Getter - designed with wispy evenly spaced clusters, this flared style adds gradual length and volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if I got a bad batch. Mine was not sticking properly and one of the lashes was really mixed up I tried to curl it again but it wouldn’t work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These were terrible. They didn’t last or stick on. If I could return them I would, Definitely would not be buying these again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to do false lashes to myself for years and I finally got them right with these! Use a lash applicator and it looked flawless. Easy to apply and looked fabulous!

reviews.review_title: If you’re on the fence, do it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was happy with these. They were very sticky and easy to use. Easy to place and try again when they seemed a little off. They lasted all night while dancing at a wedding. They looked really great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can't get the ends to stick to my eyes, and if I try to adjust the placement, I have to completely take them off and clean them. Between those 2 things I haven't successfully been able to wear them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and looked great. Wore them outside in FL, around 75 degrees and the adhesive started melting. Not great for wearing for events outside!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Go Getter - designed with wispy evenly spaced clusters, this flared style adds gradual length and volume.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very sad, they didn’t last thru dinner.   Wouldn’t buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are good if you have sensitive eye lids or suffer from stye’s or have dry eye, chalazions etc..  I have the style Go Getter, so easy to wear but I hope she comes out with more styles and lengths in the future, also they’re reusable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time wearing lashes and sis not want to deal with glue. These are spectacular.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Only giving a star because they are really good lashes , but first off the layer of glue is thicker than the band making a giant band that’s visible. If you thought that would be the worst part you are wrong! Taking these off hurt so bad and lifted off my natural lash

reviews.review_title: Might be must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad for first time user , it was easy , i will definitely will purchase it  and recommend ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome great product! Easy to apply and long lasting. I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these false lashes! I’m honestly a newbie to using false lashes, so it took me a while to correctly apply these. Once I finally got them on, I loved the way they looked. They looked natural while giving me the extra volume and length I like. They stayed on the whole time I was wearing them and were extremely comfortable. They are very high quality and the packaging just helps solidify that fact. Everything about them is just perfect!

reviews.review_title: Must have if you hate glue!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! I was never good with glue and these work awesome. Got them on in one try and stuck until I peeled them off. Kept shape when I returned to the case. Hope they stick as well for the next use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lashes! They look amazing on, and are easy to use once you get the hang of it.  The reason I’m giving three stars is because they DEF DO NOT WEAR FIVE+ times like it claims.  They are more of a one time use, and then have to get a new pair. Sometimes if I’m lucky I’ll be able to wear it a second time. But for the most part I see them as a one time use thing, which is expensive and annoying. I’ve ever tried to buy dry them to make them more sticky like lily says to do, but it did not work. Wish they actually were reusable because then I’d give it five stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the packaging and the design of the lash set. In general I loved the idea of it being self adhesive since you save time. You have to clean them very well to keep then in shape. It was a bit trickier to use them the first time since the bands is wider than a regular one. Overall just need practice to get it done faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Save your money because these lashes do not stick at all. The band is fairly thicker compared to other lashes which made me believe the company’s claim that it works with body heat to stick. I tried putting them on on a clean and make up free skin but regardless it would not stick to my

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly a really cool product! My biggest pain about fake lashes is the clue so I love that this already had adhesive and I can skip that hassle-d step! Love this product and will be purchasing in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these lashes so badly, as the self adhesive was really intriguing to me. Unfortunately I did not have good luck with mine, they did not adhere well and stay on for me, I tried before and after eyeshadow application. Otherwise they are a beautiful style lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to use these but so glad I got to try. They are relatively easy to put on and last long enough to get me through an event. You can also trim the lashes a little for a more subtle look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a neat concept! I use glue lashes all the time but sometimes you just need something quick or on the go and these are perfect for that! Had no trouble putting them on and they stayed throughout the day, no glue needed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly really wanted to like this product because sometimes the lash glue can irritate my eyes but this one was awful. The band is wayyyyyy too thick and difficult to navigate, the glue or adhesive on it wouldn’t stick  wa

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these self adhesive trendsetterlilly lashes. I love that you can just pop them right on and be done. They are super cute I definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_title: Self adhesive makes these super easy to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes were relatively easy to apply. I liked the adhesive. I put them on over eye shadow so they didn't stick as well. The corners wouldn't stay down. But on naked eyes they'd probably stick pretty well. And they looked a lot better than some other lashes I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very new to false eyelashes. I’ve only worn false eyelashes once before for an event, so I liked that these were self adhesive. I like the style too. Definitely adds volume and glam to a look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally only wear lashes when going to events so I have never been a pro at applying them. This product is super easy to use even if you do not have much experience with applying lashes. It took only a couple minutes to apply them, and removing them was a breeze. I would highly recommend this product especially for beginners and people that don’t normally wear lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these false lashes! It was super easy to apply and lasted all day and I work 11 hour days nannying kids and being outside with hot weather! Never had a problem, didn't need to fix them or reapply! I'm also very sensitive around the eye area and didn't experience any irritation! Definitely would buy and recommend to everyone that loves false lashes!  I received this product in exchange for a review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these false lashes! It was super easy to apply and lasted all day and I work 11 hour days nannying kids and being outside with hot weather! Never had a problem, didn't need to fix them or reapply! I'm also very sensitive around the eye area and didn't experience any irritation! Definitely would buy and recommend to everyone that loves false lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: They do not work for 5 wears. I used them once without them coming off my eye. The style is pretty so I use them with lash glue, but defeats the purpose of self adhesive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging was perfect! I loved that the box was of a harder protective case as well as the brackets the lashes could attach and detach from the box. Making it more reusable for the future. I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For someone who doesn’t usually wear false lashes, there were pretty easy to apply since there was no need to add glue. I didn’t get a chance to wear them for a very extended period of time so can’t not attest to their longevity and wear time. The adhesive is sticky enough that I can see it being reusable for many times. The lashes are very full and they do look very glamorous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally only wear lashes when going to events so I have never been a pro at applying them. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So these lily lashes are gorgeous. I really love the style of the lash. I also like that it was self adhesive. But the adhesive and my skin did not agree. So I was unable to use them properly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not good at lashes so self adhesive really caught my eye. They stuck right away, had no issues. I did have to trim a little because it was poking my inner corner. They lasted all day even with sweating! I tried them a second time and they lasted just the same! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful lashes, but the adhesive on the pair that I got didn’t stick as well as I would’ve liked it too, so I had to add more glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starting with the packaging, it's very simple and easy to see the lashes. As for the lashes themselves, there is a bit of a learning curve but they're easy enough. I like that they can be reused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to trim if needed. I loved the fullness. LOVE that there’s no glue. I always get that in my eye. Definitely feel like I can wear them more than 5 times. Removal was easy too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They are for sure very sticky. They are not the best lashes I’ve worn. They are very heavy and not seamless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So these lily lashes are gorgeous. I really love the style of the lash. I also like that it was self adhesive. But the adhesive and my skin did not agree. So I was unable to use them properly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes work surprisingly well! They are pre-glued with a reusable adhesive, so you just peel and stick, no lash glue needed! The adhesive was super sticky the first time around and the lashes stay put well and are fairly comfortable. The fan is bold and dramatic, so these aren’t for a barely-there look. They lose their shape a little when they’re peeled off, so try to keep repositioning to a minimum. They are reusable, but they don’t look quite as fresh on subsequent wears.

reviews.review_title: Super simple to apply, with no messy glue.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used these twice, but I love how easy they were to apply. To ensure they stuck well and didn’t pop off, I wore them with no additional eye makeup, and they certainly did hold! While I could feel them on my eyes at first, they weren’t uncomfortable at all and I got used to them quickly. I love that there was no messy glue to deal with, especially when I had to reposition.  They also peeled off very easily too. I would definitely purchase these in different styles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical but these worked so well! They were easy enough to apply just like regular lashes and they stayed on all night while I was out and about at the beach in Alabama weather. The shape was already great for my eye and they’re big but not overwhelming. I love that the packaging had the left and right lash clearly marked. I’m definitely grabbing more of these, they’re a breakthrough for lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging was so so pretty! The value for the money was beyond amazing! They were extremely easy to apply and I received so many compliments on them

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and looks great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, and the adhesive works great for all day occasions. I love the look of the lashes, doesn’t feel overly heavy or fake. The packaging is super cute and pink. Easy to apply and easy to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved being able to sample these lashes for my opinion and review. I have to say these were great to apply and lasted awhile which was great, did not need to reapply and was happy with the results! I would recommend to family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter uses lashes all the time. She was excited to try these since they didn't need lash glue. Unfortunately, they did not work for as described. She couldn't get them to stay on at all. She was bummed because she really liked the looks of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are some of the easiest to put on and take off lashes that I have used! And I have used many! My eyes are not sensitive to the product. I will continue to use and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lashes! Normally I’m not too fond of false lashers because I normally can’t get them on right lol , but these were super easy to apply and the perfect length. They add the pop to my eyes . I can’t wait to wear these for girls night out. They are super lightweight. My only complaint is the lash band is a little thick, but I can get beside that. The packaging is super cute and definitely help me not lose them when I took them off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are so beautiful! They are fluffy and full, but wispy so they still look incredibly natural. I did have to trim the length a bit to fit my eyes better, but they are so gorgeous! And they can be reworn 2-3 times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are so beautiful! They are fluffy and full, but wispy so they still look incredibly natural. I did have to trim the length a bit to fit my eyes better, but they are so gorgeous! And they can be reworn 2-3 times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lashes! Normally I’m not too fond of falsies, but these were super easy to apply and the perfect length. They make my eyes look wider. I can’t wait to wear these to my conference coming up. They are super lightweight. My only complaint is the lash band is a little thick, but I can get beside that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for these lashes. The packaging is very cute and I loved how the lashes were displayed. It made it easy to replace the lashes when I was done wearing them. Unfortunately the self adhesive glue did not live up to my expectations. They were harder than normal to apply and seed to pop off in the corners quite a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyelashes are super easy to use,especially for beginners. Body heat is what actually makes it stick and they last all day long. They can be reused thanks to the eyelash shaped packaging and are a great value . I received this product as a free sample but all opinions are my personal own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and make me feel more confident. What more could I ask for ?!  The lashes stayed on all day and did not bother me while wearing. I will definitely be purchasing more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster for sending these to me complimentary!! I love products that make my life easier and this is definitely one of them! These were so easy to use and they are beautiful as well. Packaging is super cute! I do have sensitive eyes but these did not bother me at all. Super easy process to put on and take off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lashes! They are very easy to apply and without the hassle of having to use lash glue. If anyone has used lashes before they know it can be tricky to do so but this brand make it easy to adjust. Also it being reusable up to 5 wears is amazing- great value for your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are a cool concept for lashes. I HATE lash glue and this really takes everything I hate about fake lashes out of the game. They are pretty, reusable, easy to apply (as easy as fake lashes can be to apply) but I did have trouble getting the entire lash to stick and stay stuck. They are pretty and great when they work but sometimes they wouldn’t stick all the way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes were fool proof, they work really well even if you are less than experienced with lashes. They lasted all through the day. The packaging was bright, cute, and sturdy considering that they are reusable and need a place to be stored. They were simple enough for a natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The box is very cute but the lashes didn't stay in their holders in the box. I'm new to Faux lashes and I wish they were easier to use. They didn't stick well for me I would prefer a glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super cute, I’m so used to wearing strip lashes and I’m obsessed with how easy it is to apply them. I love the end results and it takes just seconds to put them on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes were great. I loved the ease of not needing glue and them being self adhesive. The quality feels great and I feel that if you are careful enough you may be able to get more than 5 uses out of them, that is of course with the help of lash glue at that point. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are really cool! Lashes are usually so hard for me with the glue, tweezers, etc but these pretty much eliminate all of that. I found these to be super lightweight and easy to apply, and they truly did hold all day with just body heat. I would definitely recommend these if you struggle with traditional lashes like me, or are looking for a pair to keep in your grab and go makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this packaging. It makes for easy storage for re-use. They were easy to apply and lasted all day long. I loved the flare they gave and glam look.

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but it’s a no for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ohhhkay.  Not run to go get, but just ugh.  Great idea, but these fall short of what they wanted to be.  They don’t stay on well, little heavy, but gorgeous for the few minutes they stayed on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how simple these are, with no lash glue or anything else needed to apply. However, they’re reusable and stick very well! I really like the lush look it gives my lashes, with the black strip acting almost like liner. These are very well made and can be cut to fit perfectly. I can’t wait to wear these out again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this from Influenster to give my honest review. The packaging is very nice it’s Heavy duty. They do not have a scent. They were very sticky and did not move all day long. Definitely worth the value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lily Lashes. These are fairly innovative and I like that you don’t have to use glue. They are very stick and apply fairly easy. They are long so I needed to trim mine. The band is a thick black band which some people might not like. They are obvious false lashes and are not subtle. They are very pretty and did last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So the best part of these of you don’t have to use glue, the lash band is super soft and you can wear them more than once, they’re reusable! Over all they’re a really good quality

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far I really love these lashes. I had some trouble getting them on, but that’s because I’m not the best, but once I got them on they stuck with ease. I was really surprised how well the heat activation worked. The packing was really nice and it was super easy to get the lashes out. I liked how they stored the lashes it really helps them keep their shape. I think it’s overall a great value. I am interested in trying more lashes out by this company especially the heat activated ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE that you do not need a glue. I’m not the best at applying lashes so I love that they’re self adhesive. They look amazing and are so soft. I’m a little apprehensive to see if they truly last as long as they say but so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough wonderful things about these Lilly self adhesive lashes!!  They are a game changer!!!  I have to admit I was a little skeptical about how well they could possibly stay on without glue .  I was actually shocked at how easy they were to apply and how comfortable and long wearing they are.   They stayed put til I took them off and best of all I didn’t lose a single eyelash the way I do when I glue them on. They actually become more comfortable as I wore them because they are body heat activated and conformed perfectly to my eye shape. The lashes are long and lush and they can be worn several times without losing their adhesive strength!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure I haven’t had a chance to try these lashes yet as my package just arrived with 2 days remaining in my campaign. Just looking at them through they look to be high quality and they are very well packaged. The lashes are soft and have the look of real ones, not overly fake in a true black color. I will be curious to see how the adhesive sticks and if it’s truly an all day wear. I can’t wait to find just the right occasion to wear them out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are beautiful however I find the self stick to be too sticky and I can’t get them to properly line up to my lash line with my lash tweezers because it sticks to them. I would recommend just getting drugstore lashes and glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have often struggled with fake lashes because it’s sometimes difficult to judge when the glue is just tacky enough to effectively apply the lashes. I was shocked at how well these stayed in place — all night — and they didn’t even flake off at the inner or outer corners. These were the perfect length and did not require trimming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who sucks at make up in general I love that there is no glue involved for these lashes. It makes them actually easy to apply and readjust. Perfect for beginners and affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These false lashes are easy to use and I love that you don't need any glue to apply as I have a hard time with that. The packaging is really cute as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the way these lashes are packaged is so amazing. They are attached to a holder that comes out of the box & you can hold to remove the lashes with ease. The technology is very effective to keep these on for a whole days wear. I will be purchasing more styles asap! Highly recommend these if you are having trouble with the glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes were really amazing! The application is so unique and innovative! The packaging is cute and simple with the magnetic strip for storage I like that. They’re easily removable and I love how cute they look on me, the value is great because of how meant times you can reuse these. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to false lashes, but these ones were super easy to put on. They looked amazing, and I didn't even need glue! I love that you can store them in the packaging and reuse them. They're so pretty, but they still look natural and not over the top.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for the non Glue girlies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are absolutely phenomenal, with it being no glue needed they’re perfect for a on the go look , would most definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying I am a lash newbie! This was my first pair. I never tried them before because I was nervous about using the glue. These are much easier! I love the way the packaging looks, so cute. Definitely catches your eye. Application and removal was a breeze. I should get plenty of wears from this set. Excited to try more styles now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity of trying out these lashes for free from influenster & Lilly Lashes, I love them so much! They are beautiful and wispy I love that I don’t need to apply any glue. The packaging is also really nice , they come in a magnetic box!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glue isn't sticky enough to use on its own, sadly. Love the concept of that, though. The design of the lashes is stunning. Easy to apply, even with added glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. These are so pretty. I was worried they would be too much for me but once I got them on they are gorgeous. I did have to trim them just a bit because they were a little too long for me. They were easy to apply and stayed on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the look of the Trendsetter style Lilly Lashes. The packaging is super cute and easy to store/convenient to carry. I love the convenience of the lashes already having glue, making these super easy to apply and great for travel. Now- I really like the tapered design of these. They’re shorter by your tear ducts and get longer towards the outer edges of your eye. This follows the lengths of my natural eyelashes, making these lashes a bit more natural looking and less crazy. I’m not into eyelashes chomping at people when I blink so I like the more natural style of these. They were fairly easy to apply (I’m not the greatest at applying as it is) and I loved not having to mess with glue. They’ve stayed on without issue for the last 6 hours so far. Also, really like that you can get 3-5 uses out of these without adding your own glue but after that, you can still keep using them by adding glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No glue necessary to put on my lashes? Sign me up! These were some of the easiest lashes to put on! The adhesive uses your body heat and they stuck so nicely without hurting my eye when I removed them! I will definitely be purchasing these in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging was nice and luxe feeling. I went in knowing these were self adhering but had to take care getting them out of the storage case - the glue was extra strong. When it comes to application I didn’t need to trim the lashes but it did take 2 tries on my first eye to get the hang of application.  The band is a little thicker than I would want but not a deal breaker. They’re voluminous but natural looking while on and removal was easy. I have naturally oily eyelids and did not find issue with them slipping and sliding as the day went on. It states up to 5 wears and I think if you take care of them you will get your moneys worth. I am not an everyday lash wearer but this item would solve that problem for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such cute packaging and the eyelashes are amazing and no scent and makes my eyes really pop love this so much the lashes come in a pink box which is adorable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Lily Lashes they are beautiful. From the moment I put them on, I felt like a total glam queen. The lashes are incredibly lightweight and easy to apply. I love that no glue is needed. They're also very durable too. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are a must have! So easy to apply, they’re so natural looking, and beautiful. And most importantly,  they stayed on all night long. I wore them to a 4 hour concert and they were still in place by time I got home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THESE! I’ve never tried this brand before and just received them in the mail and the quality of the packaging caught my eye immediately. I love the box they come in it’s made so well and a perfect design to reuse them! They are so full and fluffy in a natural way! I usually go for cheap lashes but I see a difference in quality immediately. I will definitely be buying this brand again in the future

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are self adhesive as they claim to be. In the past I never bothered with lashes because they are too much work. With these ones they are not bad at all lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are so cute and so easy to apply. I really liked them and they felt good while wearing them. I think my favorite part is that you don’t need glue and they’re reusable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These stayed on all day, and were easy to apply.  I have used them 3 times so far. I think that they are pretty durable too. Once they start not self-adhering, I will use them with glue. For the review that stated these didn't stick for them, I'm wondering if that person applied the lashes over eyeshadow/liner/primer, etc.. These need to be applied to bare skin for the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't stay on at all.  So disappointed after watching the video where she just presses them on and they stay.  Awful!  I could have bought 5 pairs of regular falsies for what I paid for these.

reviews.review_title: Stayed on even through hardcore show
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been able to put on fake lashes before, fighting the glue and the tweezers, but these worked. They took a bit maneuvering but otherwise I got them on and they looked amazing. Plus they stayed on all day/evening even through a hardcore show and a serious makeout session, so.... I'll be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They look nice but weren't secured in the box well. They were rolling around inside the box which resulted in the hairs separating on the end of one of them. You can see in my photo a noticeable gap/space on the top lash. Not ideal for a $16 singular pair of lashes imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: both even stay on for an hour in an indoor environment without additional lash adhesive, love the idea so disappointed that the results don’t woek

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lily Lashes has completely changed the lash game with these bad boys.  I have always struggled with putting on lashes and because of that, I only wear them once in awhile.  These lashes are so simple and easy to apply and they stay on.  I have only worn them twice so far so I am unsure of how long they last for though. I am So happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are gorgeous and so easy to apply and wear! Best thing ever compared to having to use glue etc. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am impressed not even with non need glue feature, but because of the lash itself, its very nature looking on my eye and its amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lashes i was able to apply in seconds and have always struggled with lash application. So easy! and they stayed on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Girls throw out the glue and the magnets this we have a winner ! I bought my first pair directly from Lilly lashes then I was hooked! I bought 3 different pairs now I’m a Floridian & they hold up in humidity why would I ever fight with glue if I can do this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am I love with these lashes! They are the holy grail and so easy to stick on and they lasted all day through a windy baseball game and chasing around a toddler!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: We bought these lashes on lillylashes.com after someone recommended them to us and you need to run and get yourself some! I’m so excited to see them now available at Sephora! My daughter wears lashes for dance competitions and has always struggled to do them herself with every glue-on kind. These were so easy for her to put on and stayed on great after 9 hours of dancing. Then they came off so easy and left behind none of the residue or glue. We will never go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes are gorgeous and so easy to apply and wear! Best thing ever compared to having to use glue etc. Highly recommend!!
